channel.title: Hiscores
channel.description:
Okay, I switched my hiscores to my website host instead of my computer. Now, it DCs my server a lot. I have one connection to the host, which is when the server starts up. Is there anyway to stop the DCing? I used to host it on my computer, and it it didn't DC. [b]EDIT:[/b]I get this in my run: [code=JAVA]com.mysql.jdbc.CommunicationsException: Communications link failure due to under lying exception:
** BEGIN NESTED EXCEPTION **
java.io.EOFException
STACKTRACE:
java.io.EOFException at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.readFully(MysqlIO.java:1963) at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.reuseAndReadPacket(MysqlIO.java:2375) at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.checkErrorPacket(MysqlIO.java:2874) at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.sendCommand(MysqlIO.java:1623) at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.sqlQueryDirect(MysqlIO.java:1715) at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.execSQL(Connection.java:3243) at com.mysql.jdbc.Statement.executeUpdate(Statement.java:1343) at com.mysql.jdbc.Statement.executeUpdate(Statement.java:1260) at SQL.query(SQL.java:25) at SQL.offline(SQL.java:138) at client.logout(client.java:17581) at clickingMost.clicking(clickingMost.java:690) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:24077) at client.packetProcess(client.java:26116) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:290) at process.run(process.java:14) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
** END NESTED EXCEPTION **
Last packet sent to the server was 1 ms ago. at java.lang.Throwable.<init>(Throwable.java:181) at java.lang.Exception.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.sql.SQLException.<init>(Unknown Source) at com.mysql.jdbc.CommunicationsException.<init>(CommunicationsException .java:56) at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.reuseAndReadPacket(MysqlIO.java:2586) at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.checkErrorPacket(MysqlIO.java:2874) at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.sendCommand(MysqlIO.java:1623) at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.sqlQueryDirect(MysqlIO.java:1715) at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.execSQL(Connection.java:3243) at com.mysql.jdbc.Statement.executeUpdate(Statement.java:1343) at com.mysql.jdbc.Statement.executeUpdate(Statement.java:1260) at SQL.query(SQL.java:25) at SQL.offline(SQL.java:138) at client.logout(client.java:17581) at clickingMost.clicking(clickingMost.java:690) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:24077) at client.packetProcess(client.java:26116) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:290) at process.run(process.java:14) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.MySQLIntegrityConstraintViolationException: Duplicate entry '1' for key 1 at java.lang.Throwable.<init>(Throwable.java:196) at java.lang.Exception.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.sql.SQLException.<init>(Unknown Source) at com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.MySQLNonTransientException.<init>(MySQLNonT ransientException.java:35) at com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.MySQLIntegrityConstraintViolationException. <init>(MySQLIntegrityConstraintViolationException.java:34) at com.mysql.jdbc.SQLError.createSQLException(SQLError.java:931) at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.checkErrorPacket(MysqlIO.java:2941) at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.sendCommand(MysqlIO.java:1623) at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.sqlQueryDirect(MysqlIO.java:1715) at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.execSQL(Connection.java:3243) at com.mysql.jdbc.Statement.executeUpdate(Statement.java:1343) at com.mysql.jdbc.Statement.executeUpdate(Statement.java:1260) at SQL.query(SQL.java:25) at SQL.online(SQL.java:149) at client.logout(client.java:17582) at clickingMost.clicking(clickingMost.java:690) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:24077) at client.packetProcess(client.java:26116) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:290) at process.run(process.java:14) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]

item.title: Hiscores
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

Okay, I switched my hiscores to my website host instead of my computer. Now, it DCs my server a lot. I have one connection to the host, which is when the server starts up. Is there anyway to stop the DCing? I used to host it on my computer, and it it didn’t DC.
EDIT:I get this in my run: [code=JAVA]com.mysql.jdbc.CommunicationsException: Communications link failure due to under
lying exception:

** BEGIN NESTED EXCEPTION **

java.io.EOFException

STACKTRACE:

java.io.EOFException
at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.readFully(MysqlIO.java:1963)
at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.reuseAndReadPacket(MysqlIO.java:2375)

Last packet sent to the server was 1 ms ago.

ransientException.java:35)
